title: Bottled water demand is price elastic

content.prompt: Assume that demand for bottled water is relatively price elastic. An increase in supply of bottled water will result in which of the following?

choices.label: A decrease in price, leading to an increase in total revenue
A decrease in price, leading to a decrease in total revenue
A relatively small decrease in price and no change in equilibrium quantity

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
